entries.title: A Race to Bridge the Analog Divide in US Politics
entries.description: Nothing beats in-person efforts to boost a campaign. But rising platforms are helping connect politicians with the rest of us.

entries.title: Inside the ‘Election Integrity App’ Built to Purge US Voter Rolls
entries.description: True the Vote’s IV3 app is meant to catch election cheaters. But it has a fundamental flaw.

entries.title: China’s Digital Yuan Works Just Like Cash—With Added Surveillance
entries.description: Government officials are urging citizens to adopt the official digital currency in a bid to gain more control over the economy.

entries.title: After Twitter Staff Cuts, Survivors Face ‘Radio Silence’
entries.description: The long-suffering staffers who remain at the company are scrambling to regroup and adapt to a new management style.

entries.title: Inside Meta’s Oversight Board: 2 Years of Pushing Limits
entries.description: Mark Zuckerberg set up the panel to investigate how his company handles controversial posts. Now its members want to transform how social platforms work.
